mapper.sql: select ANNOUNCEMENT_INFO_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, APPROVAL_FLAG, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ENT_ID from inspection_announcement_info
mapper.select: select u.UNITS_ID,u.ORG_ID,u.ORG_NAME,u.created_time,count(d.UNITS_ID) as count from inspection_units u left join inspection_announcement_info d on u.UNITS_ID = d.UNITS_ID where u.plan_id = #{planId} group by u.UNITS_ID order by u.created_time, u.UNITS_ID desc

select ANNOUNCEMENT_INFO_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, APPROVAL_FLAG, i.CREATED_BY, i.CREATED_TIME, i.UPDATED_BY, i.UPDATED_TIME, i.ENT_ID from inspection_announcement_info where ANNOUNCEMENT_INFO_ID = #{announcementInfoId} -- left join piis_document doc on concat('AnnouncementInfo', i.ANNOUNCEMENT_INFO_ID) = doc.OBJECT_ID
select doc.PIIS_DOC_ID, doc.OBJECT_ID, doc.FILE_DICT_ID, doc.FILE_NAME, doc.FILE_SIZE, doc.FILE_PATH from piis_document doc where doc.OBJECT_ID = concat('AnnouncementInfo', #{announcementInfoId})
